1370: Gertrudis moved to Den Hof.B.4 after marriage.
Got married to Barwoud at age 25 in 1370.
Gave birth to Sophia in 1370 at age 25.
1372: Gave birth to Volcwiif in 1372 at age 27.
1374: Gave birth to Siabbo in 1374 at age 29.
1375: Lost son Siabbo when Siabbo was 2 years old.
1376: Gave birth to Reymar in 1376 at age 31.
1377: Gave birth to Brun in 1377 at age 32.
Lost daughter Volcwiif when Volcwiif was 6 years old.
1378: Died while giving birth to Salomon in 1378 at age 33.
